sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Binutils-&binutils-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, nm, ranlib diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, rmdir, touch gcc: gcc grep: egrep, grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: basename, expr, sleep, true, uname texinfo: makeinfo textutils: cat, sort, tail, tr, uniq
